content:
As an AI language model, I cannot make definitive predictions, and there are various factors to consider. However, having these items would undoubtedly improve your chances of survival on a deserted island by providing you with essential resources, communication, and safety. 

It's crucial to note that survival on an uninhabited island requires various skills, such as finding food, building shelter, starting and maintaining a fire, and staying healthy. The ability to adapt to a new environment and stay mentally and emotionally resilient is also essential. 

Even with the best resources, it's still challenging to survive indefinitely on a deserted island, and it's essential to have a realistic plan for rescue or a way to obtain more supplies. Nevertheless, with the right mindset, knowledge, and tools, people have been known to survive on deserted islands for months or even years.
